title: REVIEW THE BAN SYSTEM
body:
I just received a 14 day ban, for defending myself against the actions of my teammate (who were intentionally trolling) and being abusive in game towards me, 

now, let me note that whereas you will see i wasn't using foul insults, racist or homophobic slurs, or any sort of derogatory statements, what was said was in defence of actions against my teammates (both verbal and gameplay)

NONE OF THE OTHER PARTIES (WHO WERE USING SLURRS, FOUL LANGUAGE TOWARD ME, IENTIONALLY RUINING MY GAMEPLAY) WERE PENALISED, AND SOME OF WHOM (WHICH DISGUSTS ME THE MOST) ACTUALLY HAD HONOUR BADGES...

My point is this, i think that ALL ASPECTS should be taken into account before punishments are doled out, the game which pushed it over the edge, (A RANKED GAME) my teammate intentionally banned my champ i had declared (teemo, which wouldve won us the game) then team abuses me for feeding (which i hadnt) and i defend my self, and I GET BANNED, 
not cool Riot,

 i spend enough time and money on this game to know when im being toxic and when other players are trolling. I BELIEVE THE  ACTIONS AND INTENT OF ALL PLAYERS NEEDS TO BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT BEFORE ISSUING PENALTIES, 
because, before my unwarrented bans, you will find i was (and still am) an honourable player, 

but if stuff like this continues i will cease to play this game, and also cease to promote this game to others via my respective social media accounts, i've already lost one account i put hundreds of dollars into by defending myself against people actively trolling and ruining gameplay for others, 

I WILL NOT LOSE ANOTHER


BELOW ARE THE CHAT LOGS.

(in this game, caitlyn had banned teemo when i was first on my team to declare intent (which was teemo)

Side note, the TF i was facing was one of the most toxic players ive ever come across, and the report i lodged for him did nothing.. again, wtf riot


Game 1
Fillet o Fitz: when you declare intent, then ADC bans them
Fillet o Fitz: gg
Fillet o Fitz: oh i will be
Fillet o Fitz: im trying to,but it just pisses me off, whats the point in declaring
Fillet o Fitz: this is why i wanted teemo
Fillet o Fitz: illaoi too easy to counter
Fillet o Fitz: wp
Fillet o Fitz: report yas, failibg to asssist when asked
Fillet o Fitz: been puinging for aswsistance last 5 mins,
Fillet o Fitz: i am,
Fillet o Fitz: i got ganked
Fillet o Fitz: i was pinging vack when you were 2 aa from death near my turret
Fillet o Fitz: he wzs right there
Fillet o Fitz: yas
Fillet o Fitz: help me at top
Fillet o Fitz: how many fkn times i hgotta ping
Fillet o Fitz: yea, sure looks like youre winning lanes
Fillet o Fitz: ty
Fillet o Fitz: lol, i declared teemo,to have caitlyn then ban him
Fillet o Fitz: told thdm illaoi too easy to counter, still banned
Fillet o Fitz: lol, you say having trouble to me, yet you have everyone babysit you, lol
Fillet o Fitz: gg
Fillet o Fitz: thanks again for banning the champ whichwouldve won me lane nand game caitlyn
Fillet o Fitz: real top nitch move ate
Fillet o Fitz: still cant believe my own team fked me
Fillet o Fitz: well, caitlyn
Fillet o Fitz: yas, im getting camped my mid and jg, can you come help me get the turret plz
Fillet o Fitz: vlad,
Fillet o Fitz: i declared, my OWN TEAMMATE banned,
Fillet o Fitz: i have every right to be annoyed
Fillet o Fitz: yea, getting flamed by my team
Fillet o Fitz: not with everyone sitting in your lane, and you with ult
Fillet o Fitz: me?
Fillet o Fitz: i was constant 2v1 in lane, he hasnt solo'd me once
Fillet o Fitz: he has 3 kills, one of which is yasuo
Fillet o Fitz: cait, how about you stop flaming me, youre the one who BANNED MY CHAMP
Fillet o Fitz: vlad shut up
Fillet o Fitz: muting you all
Fillet o Fitz: caitlyn, i have a kill to illaoi, a kill to tf, and a kill to yi
Fillet o Fitz: I DIDNT FEECD TF
Fillet o Fitz: your lane is 3/10, who fed now?\
Fillet o Fitz: lol, vlad learnt how to ping
Fillet o Fitz: shame you couldnt ping missings early game whenakali came top to kill me
Fillet o Fitz: reporting caitlyn feeding / griefing (banning my champ)
Fillet o Fitz: in future, look at who your team has declared before banning plz
Fillet o Fitz: you guys been flaming the fk out of me all game,
Fillet o Fitz: lol caitlyn, thats because you know YOU ARE IN THE WRONG
Fillet o Fitz: what do you expect, my team fed you
Fillet o Fitz: this vlad is toxic af, my own adc banned the champ which wouldve won us the game
Fillet o Fitz: no, my first 3 deaths were 1 to you, one to akali, and one to yoi
Fillet o Fitz: *yi
Fillet o Fitz: lol, nah mate
Fillet o Fitz: if i had teemo, 3 of your team would be useless
Fillet o Fitz: i know
Fillet o Fitz: i needed DD first
Fillet o Fitz: i just love how much smack TF talks when you guys had to babysit him through lane
Fillet o Fitz: ggwp, plz end
Fillet o Fitz: need a team that doesnt fk their teammates
Fillet o Fitz: ggwp


(in this game, if they post the whole chat logs, akali was wasting time, then exected us to leave lane for first and second wave, got abusive when i told her she wasted my time) 
AGAIN, they were toxic af, i was defending myself, I GET BANNED they get no punishment


Game 2
Fillet o Fitz: thanks for wasting my first wave akali
Fillet o Fitz: top notch effort
Fillet o Fitz: why ping for assistance then, wtAF
Fillet o Fitz: cuz u wasted our time
Fillet o Fitz: no,actually 50seconds
Fillet o Fitz: leona, sell relic plz
Fillet o Fitz: get his
Fillet o Fitz: this
Fillet o Fitz: yes
Fillet o Fitz: gj
Fillet o Fitz: fk
Fillet o Fitz: wp
Fillet o Fitz: leona, i follow your lead on ult,
Fillet o Fitz: you ultin for stun,then i ult e for root, easy doules
Fillet o Fitz: why no ward, you have eye
Fillet o Fitz: doesnt explain why no wards out, but ok
Fillet o Fitz: goaway ornn
Fillet o Fitz: ggwp
Fillet o Fitz: wasted game
Fillet o Fitz: just once, give me a competent tem
Fillet o Fitz: team, just once
Fillet o Fitz: end plz
Fillet o Fitz: im done with league for today, too many trolls
Fillet o Fitz: her Q
Fillet o Fitz: nah
Fillet o Fitz: you now what would be "wurf"
Fillet o Fitz: you gankng
Fillet o Fitz: fizz stop flashing your crest, you were afk half the game and dont help team
Fillet o Fitz: yea, you are
Fillet o Fitz: so stop flashing that crest
Fillet o Fitz: thnx for save leona, <3
Fillet o Fitz: report our akali
Fillet o Fitz: notice how their jg ganks akali?
Fillet o Fitz: thats why all lanes are pushed, thats what you should be doing
Fillet o Fitz: you guys should honour your ornn
Fillet o Fitz: and report our akali
Fillet o Fitz: because youre being a good jg
Fillet o Fitz: you gank, you help with objectives,
Fillet o Fitz: our akal... well i dunno wtf that gurl doin
Fillet o Fitz: when their jg ganks and yours doesnt, thats why
Fillet o Fitz: lol, trash talk all you want fizz
Fillet o Fitz: reported for afk/abusive
Fillet o Fitz: that means you can be abusive?
Fillet o Fitz: lol, little brain wont understad it, like you and the concept of jg
Fillet o Fitz: ggwp
Fillet o Fitz: Report akali toxic/failing to gank
Fillet o Fitz: and fizz afk

In this game, they lock in elise support, (even though asked to use a supp champ) saying ists only norms (I THINK THAT ALONE SHOULD BE WORTHY OF REPORT, THE "ITS NORMS ATTITUDE"), both her and akali were toxic, feeding, and actively trolling my lane, feeding enemy, standing my pinging they will engage, only to watch me die then engage after to get kills

again, reported their toxic behavior, NO PENALTY ISSUED, I GET BANNED

Game 3
Fillet o Fitz: r u srs?
Fillet o Fitz: elise trolling, rip
Fillet o Fitz: no, you sat back and waited to steal a kill, it was just coincidence i didnt die,
Fillet o Fitz: i main supp, dont try bs me bro and just play
Fillet o Fitz: ty
Fillet o Fitz: thats no excuse to troll elise
Fillet o Fitz: imout, gg
Fillet o Fitz: elise trolling me,
Fillet o Fitz: can i swap with someone plz
Fillet o Fitz: thuis elise trolling me and im tryng not to rage
Fillet o Fitz: plz
Fillet o Fitz: sigh
Fillet o Fitz: i have a trolling support and no one will swap lanes, :/
Fillet o Fitz: 3 bot and jg stays farming when he;s right there,
Fillet o Fitz: legit done
Fillet o Fitz: gj
Fillet o Fitz: no, im solo bot lane, with a support who trolls, and a jg who doesnt gank
Fillet o Fitz: see what i mean
Fillet o Fitz: no
Fillet o Fitz: thats no excuse to troll and be rude
Fillet o Fitz: im not toxic bro, m stating FACTS
Fillet o Fitz: u deserve it
Fillet o Fitz: youre flat out trolling
Fillet o Fitz: you expect me to be happy and kind and say "oh thanks for trollibng me hard elise"
Fillet o Fitz: oh thanks for trolling me hard elise,
Fillet o Fitz: ty
Fillet o Fitz: can you guys report this elise please.
Fillet o Fitz: trolling, using the excuse its only
Fillet o Fitz: casuals
Fillet o Fitz: wolves
Fillet o Fitz: stay in base, good dog
Fillet o Fitz: what, i
Fillet o Fitz: i tried,
Fillet o Fitz: what you expect me to do, i have no support, so im underfed as fk
Fillet o Fitz: i was 10 secs latem and i pinged ypou to fall back
Fillet o Fitz: im done, report elise plz,
Fillet o Fitz: no support = gg
Fillet o Fitz: vote yes
Fillet o Fitz: vote yes
Fillet o Fitz: it was ggwhenelise (even though i asked her not to) locked elise support
Fillet o Fitz: ggwp
Fillet o Fitz: ggwp, :(
Fillet o Fitz: report our "support" plz
Fillet o Fitz: baron wuic
Fillet o Fitz: if we baron now we have a chance
Fillet o Fitz: shouldve listened to me when i said baron, but elise as usual doesnt listen when i pinged to fall back, then bails
Fillet o Fitz: just end plz
Fillet o Fitz: report welise

leave thoughts in the comment section below
